name: Bulls and Cows - Wild West
description:
Welcome to the amazing farm where the captivating game "Bulls and Cows: Wild West" takes place! Here, children will embark on a unique adventure, meeting a kind and lovely cow-girl.

On the farm, amidst green pastures and picturesque meadows, our little heroes will meet Vanessa – a clever and friendly cow-guide. She will enthusiastically explain the rules of the game and help children develop their logical abilities.

"Bulls and Cows: Wild West" will offer children an endless number of levels that will capture their imagination and ignite the desire to conquer all the puzzles. Thanks to Vanessa, our little heroes will strive for new heights in solving the riddles.

Immerse yourself in the unique world of the Wild West, accompanied by lively country music. Children will enjoy every level, playing with Vanessa and her friends, and enhancing their logical skills on this captivating farm!

Get ready for an exciting adventure on the farm, uncover number mysteries, and become true sheriffs of puzzles in "Bulls and Cows: Wild West" alongside Vanessa!
